languages.text: {n}Строптивая машина и впрямь удивительно похожа на дикого зверя — рев механизма подобен хриплому рыку, а алый блеск люменов на панели управления — злобному прищуру хищника. Дух сей машины грозен, но силен и ретив.{/n}

{n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Строптивая машина и впрямь удивительно похожа на дикого зверя — рев механизма подобен хриплому рыку, а алый блеск люменов на панели управления — злобному прищуру хищника. Дух сей машины грозен, но силен и ретив.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tozuda máquina recuerda, en efecto, a una bestia salvaje. El rugido de su mecanismo es similar a un gruñido ronco, y el resplandor escarlata de los lumens del panel de control te hacen pensar a la mirada hambrienta de un depredador. El espíritu de esta máquina es agresivo, pero también fuerte y animado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tozuda máquina recuerda, en efecto, a una bestia salvaje. El rugido de su mecanismo es similar a un gruñido ronco, y el resplandor escarlata de los lumens del panel de control te hacen pensar a la mirada hambrienta de un depredador. El espíritu de esta máquina es agresivo, pero también fuerte y animado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その頑強なマシンは、確かに野獣に酷似している。メカの唸り声は嗄れたうなり声のようであり、操作パネルのルーメンの緋色の輝きは肉食獣の悪意に満ちた睨みのようだった。この機械の精神は凶暴ではあるが、力強くて生き生きとしていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その頑強なマシンは、確かに野獣に酷似している。メカの唸り声は嗄れたうなり声のようであり、操作パネルのルーメンの緋色の輝きは肉食獣の悪意に満ちた睨みのようだった。この機械の精神は凶暴ではあるが、力強くて生き生きとしていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台顽固的机器看起来确实像一头野兽一样。机械装置发出的轰鸣声仿佛嘶哑的咆哮，控制面板上的流明灯发出了猩红色的光芒，让你不禁想到捕食者充满恶意的眼神。尽管这台机器的机魂心怀恶意，但却无比强大、充满活力。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台顽固的机器看起来确实像一头野兽一样。机械装置发出的轰鸣声仿佛嘶哑的咆哮，控制面板上的流明灯发出了猩红色的光芒，让你不禁想到捕食者充满恶意的眼神。尽管这台机器的机魂心怀恶意，但却无比强大、充满活力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die eigensinnige Maschine ähnelt in der Tat sehr einer wilden Bestie. Das Gebrüll des Mechanismus erinnert an ein heiseres Knurren, und das rote Leuchten der Lumen auf dem Bedienfeld erinnert dich an den bösartigen Blick eines Raubtiers. Der Geist dieser Maschine ist grimmig, aber stark und lebendig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die eigensinnige Maschine ähnelt in der Tat sehr einer wilden Bestie. Das Gebrüll des Mechanismus erinnert an ein heiseres Knurren, und das rote Leuchten der Lumen auf dem Bedienfeld erinnert dich an den bösartigen Blick eines Raubtiers. Der Geist dieser Maschine ist grimmig, aber stark und lebendig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'engin têtu n'est effectivement pas sans évoquer une bête sauvage. Le rugissement du mécanisme s'apparente à un grondement sourd, et la lueur écarlate des lumens sur le panneau de contrôle vous fait penser au regard carnassier d'un prédateur. L'esprit de la machine est certes retors, mais il est également puissant et plein d'entrain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}

L'esprit de la machine est certes retors, mais il est également puissant et plein d'entrain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnatçı makine, hakikaten de vahşi bir yaratığa bir hayli benzerlik gösteriyor. Mekanizmanın kükreyişi, boğuk bir hırıltıyı andırıyor. Kontrol panelindeki lümenlerin kan kızılı parıltıları, aklına bir yırtıcının habis bakışlarını getiriyor. Bu makinenin ruhunda gaddarlık yatsa da kuvvetli ve canlı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The stubborn machine does indeed seem remarkably similar to a wild beast. The roar of the mechanism resembles hoarse growling, and the scarlet glow of the lumens on the control panel makes you think of the malicious glare of a predator. The spirit of this machine is vicious, but strong and lively.{/n}
